      Creates an Authorization object using the static properties PaymentsApi.PUBLIC_KEY and PaymentsApi.PRIVATE_KEY as the default public and private API keys respectively.

      As of release 1.1, replaced by create(Authentication, Map)

      Deprecated. 
      As of release 1.1, replaced by find(Authentication, String)
      protected java.lang.String getObjectType() 
      static ResourceList<Authorization> list()
      Retrieve Authorization objects using the static properties PaymentsApi.PUBLIC_KEY and PaymentsApi.PRIVATE_KEY as the default public and private API keys respectively and the default criteria (max 20, offset 0, default sorting and no filtering).
      static ResourceList<Authorization> list(Authentication auth)
      Retrieve Authorization objects using the default criteria (max 20, offset 0, default sorting and no filtering).
      static ResourceList<Authorization> list(Authentication auth, java.util.Map criteria)
      Retrieve Authorization objects using the specified criteria.
      static ResourceList<Authorization> list(java.util.Map criteria)
      Retrieve Authorization objects using the specified criteria and using the static properties PaymentsApi.PUBLIC_KEY and PaymentsApi.PRIVATE_KEY as the default public and private API keys respectively.
      static ResourceList<Authorization> list(java.lang.String publicKey, java.lang.String privateKey)
      Deprecated. 
      As of release 1.1, replaced by list(Authentication)
      static ResourceList<Authorization> list(java.lang.String publicKey, java.lang.String privateKey, java.util.Map criteria)
      Deprecated. 
      As of release 1.1, replaced by list(Authentication, Map)

      • create

        public static Authorization create(java.util.Map map)
                            throws ApiCommunicationException,
                                   AuthenticationException,
                                   InvalidRequestException,
                                   NotAllowedException,
                                   SystemException
        Creates an Authorization object using the static properties PaymentsApi.PUBLIC_KEY and PaymentsApi.PRIVATE_KEY as the default public and private API keys respectively.
        Parameters:
        map - a map of parameters, valid keys and types:
        java.lang.Long amount
        Amount of the payment (in the smallest unit of your currency). Example: 100 = $1.00 required
        payments.command.api.APICardCommand card
        Credit or debit card being used to apply the payment to.
        java.lang.String card.addressCity
        City of the cardholder. [max length: 50, min length: 2]
        java.lang.String card.addressCountry
        Country code (ISO-3166-1-alpha-2 code) of residence of the cardholder. [max length: 2, min length: 2]
        java.lang.String card.addressLine1
        Address of the cardholder. [max length: 255]
        java.lang.String card.addressLine2
        Address of the cardholder if needed. [max length: 255]
        java.lang.String card.addressState
        State of residence of the cardholder. State abbreviations should be used. [max length: 255]
        java.lang.String card.addressZip
        Postal code of the cardholder. The postal code size is between 5 and 9 characters in length and only contains numbers or letters. [max length: 32]
        java.lang.String card.cvc
        CVC security code of the card. This is the code on the back of the card. Example: 123
        java.lang.Integer card.expMonth
        Expiration month of the card. Format is MM. Example: January = 01 [min value: 1, max value: 12] required
        java.lang.Integer card.expYear
        Expiration year of the card. Format is YY. Example: 2013 = 13 [min value: 0, max value: 99] required
        java.lang.String card.name
        Name as it appears on the card. [max length: 50, min length: 2]
        java.lang.String card.number
        Card number as it appears on the card. [max length: 19, min length: 13] required
        java.lang.String currency
        Currency code (ISO-4217) for the transaction. Must match the currency associated with your account. [default: USD] required
        java.lang.String customer
        ID of customer. If specified, card on file of customer will be used.
        java.lang.String description
        Free form text field to be used as a description of the payment. This field is echoed back with the payment on any find or list operations. [max length: 1024]
        payments.command.api.APIOrderCreateCommand order
        Detailed order information.
        java.lang.String order.commodityCode
        Standard classification code for products and services. [max length: 5]
        java.lang.String order.customer
        ID of the customer associated with the order.
        java.lang.String order.customerEmail
        Customer email address.
        java.lang.String order.customerName
        Customer name.
        java.lang.String order.customerNote
        Additional notes provided by the customer. [max length: 255]
        java.lang.String order.customerReference
        A merchant reference for the customer.
        payments.command.api.APIOrderItemCreateCommand order.items
        Detailed information about individual items contained in the order.
        java.lang.Long order.items.amount
        Cost of the item.
        java.lang.String order.items.description
        Description of the item.
        java.lang.String order.items.name
        Item name.
        java.lang.String order.items.product
        Product information associated with the item.
        java.lang.Long order.items.quantity
        Quantity of the item contained in the order [min value: 1, max value: 999999, default: 1] required
        java.lang.String order.items.reference
        A merchant reference for the item. [max length: 255]
        java.lang.String order.items.tax
        Taxes associated with the item.
        java.lang.String order.merchantNote
        Additional notes provided by the merchant. [max length: 255]
        java.lang.String order.payment
        ID of the payment associated with the order.
        java.lang.String order.reference
        A merchant reference for the order. [max length: 255]
        payments.command.api.APIAddressCommand order.shippingAddress
        Address the products are being shipped to.
        java.lang.String order.shippingAddress.city
        City, town, or municipality. [max length: 255, min length: 2]
        java.lang.String order.shippingAddress.country
        2-character country code. [max length: 2, min length: 2]
        java.lang.String order.shippingAddress.line1
        Street address. [max length: 255]
        java.lang.String order.shippingAddress.line2
        (Opt) Street address continued. [max length: 255]
        java.lang.String order.shippingAddress.name
        Name of the entity being shipped to. [max length: 255]
        java.lang.String order.shippingAddress.state
        State or province. [max length: 255]
        java.lang.String order.shippingAddress.zip
        Postal code. [max length: 32]
        payments.command.api.APIAddressCommand order.shippingFromAddress
        Address the products are being shipped from.
        java.lang.String order.shippingFromAddress.city
        City, town, or municipality. [max length: 255, min length: 2]
        java.lang.String order.shippingFromAddress.country
        2-character country code. [max length: 2, min length: 2]
        java.lang.String order.shippingFromAddress.line1
        Street address. [max length: 255]
        java.lang.String order.shippingFromAddress.line2
        (Opt) Street address continued. [max length: 255]
        java.lang.String order.shippingFromAddress.name
        Name of the entity performing the shipping. [max length: 255]
        java.lang.String order.shippingFromAddress.state
        State or province. [max length: 255]
        java.lang.String order.shippingFromAddress.zip
        Postal code. [max length: 32]
        java.lang.String order.shippingName
        Name of the entity being shipped to.
        java.lang.String order.source
        Order source. [default: WEB] required
        java.lang.String order.status
        Status of the order. [default: INCOMPLETE] required
        java.lang.String reference
        Custom reference field to be used with outside systems.
        java.lang.String replayId
        An identifier that can be sent to uniquely identify a payment request to facilitate retries due to I/O related issues. This identifier must be unique for your account (sandbox or live) across all of your payments. If supplied, we will check for a payment on your account that matches this identifier, and if one is found we will attempt to return an identical response of the original request. [max length: 50, min length: 1]
        payments.command.api.APIDescriptorCommand statementDescription
        A custom descriptor for the transaction to appear on the customer's bank statement.
        java.lang.String statementDescription.name
        Merchant name required
        java.lang.String statementDescription.phoneNumber
        Merchant contact phone number.
        java.lang.String token
        If specified, card associated with card token will be used. [max length: 255]
        Returns:
        a Authorization object.
        Throws:
        ApiCommunicationException
        AuthenticationException
        InvalidRequestException
        NotAllowedException
        SystemException

        public static Authorization create(Authentication auth,
                   java.util.Map map)
                            throws ApiCommunicationException,
                                   AuthenticationException,
                                   InvalidRequestException,
                                   NotAllowedException,
                                   SystemException
        Creates an Authorization object
        Parameters:
        auth - Authentication object representing overrides for PaymentsApi.PRIVATE_KEY and PaymentsApi.PUBLIC_KEY and/or passing an access token in for operations using OAuth.
        privateKey - Private API key. If null, the value of static PaymentsApi.PRIVATE_KEY will be used
        map - a map of parameters, valid keys and types:
        java.lang.Long amount
        Amount of the payment (in the smallest unit of your currency). Example: 100 = $1.00 required
        payments.command.api.APICardCommand card
        Credit or debit card being used to apply the payment to.

      • list

        public static ResourceList<Authorization> list()
                                        throws ApiCommunicationException,
                                               AuthenticationException,
                                               InvalidRequestException,
                                               NotAllowedException,
                                               SystemException
        Retrieve Authorization objects using the static properties PaymentsApi.PUBLIC_KEY and PaymentsApi.PRIVATE_KEY as the default public and private API keys respectively and the default criteria (max 20, offset 0, default sorting and no filtering).
        Returns:
        a ResourceList object which holds the list of Authorization objects and the total number of Authorization objects available.
        Throws:
        ApiCommunicationException
        AuthenticationException
        InvalidRequestException
        NotAllowedException
        SystemException
        See Also:
        ResourceList

      • list

        @Deprecated
public static ResourceList<Authorization> list(java.lang.String publicKey,
                                          java.lang.String privateKey)
                                        throws ApiCommunicationException,
                                               AuthenticationException,
                                               InvalidRequestException,
                                               NotAllowedException,
                                               SystemException
        Deprecated. As of release 1.1, replaced by list(Authentication)
        Retrieve Authorization objects using the default criteria (max 20, offset 0, default sorting and no filtering).
        Parameters:
        publicKey - Public API key. If null, the value of static PaymentsApi.PUBLIC_KEY will be used
        privateKey - Private API key. If null, the value of static PaymentsApi.PRIVATE_KEY will be used
        Returns:
        a ResourceList object which holds the list of Authorization objects and the total number of Authorization objects available.
        Throws:
        ApiCommunicationException
        AuthenticationException
        InvalidRequestException
        NotAllowedException
        SystemException
        See Also:
        ResourceList

      • list

                                               AuthenticationException,
                                               InvalidRequestException,
                                               NotAllowedException,
                                               SystemException
        Retrieve Authorization objects using the default criteria (max 20, offset 0, default sorting and no filtering).

      • list

        public static ResourceList<Authorization> list(java.util.Map criteria)
                                        throws ApiCommunicationException,
                                               AuthenticationException,
                                               InvalidRequestException,
                                               NotAllowedException,
                                               SystemException
        Retrieve Authorization objects using the specified criteria and using the static properties PaymentsApi.PUBLIC_KEY and PaymentsApi.PRIVATE_KEY as the default public and private API keys respectively.
        Parameters:
        criteria - a map of parameters; valid keys and types are:
        java.util.Map filter
        filter.idFilter by the Authorization Id
        filter.replayIdFilter by the compoundReplayId
        filter.last4Filter by the card number (last 4 digits)
        filter.amountFilter by the transaction amount (in the smallest unit of your currency)
        filter.textFilter by the description of the authorization
        filter.amountMin & filter.amountMaxThe filter amountMin must be used with amountMax to find authorizations with authorization values between the min and max
        filter.dateCreatedMin*Filter by the minimum created date you are searching for - Date in UTC millis
        filter.dateCreatedMax*Filter by the maximum created date you are searching for - Date in UTC millis
        filter.depositFilter by the deposit id
        filter.customerFilter using the Id of the customer to find the authorizations for that customer
        filter.statusFilter by the authorization status text
        filter.authCodeFilter by the authorization code (Not the authorization ID)
        filter.qYou can use this to filter by the ID, the authCode or the amount of the authorization

        *Use dateCreatedMin with dateCreatedMax in the same filter if you want to search between two created dates
        java.lang.Integer max
        Allows up to a max of 50 list items to return. [min value: 0, max value: 50, default: 20]
        java.lang.Integer offset
        Used in pagination of the list. This is the start offset of the page. [min value: 0, default: 0]
        java.util.Map sorting
        Allows for ascending or descending sorting of the list. The value maps properties to the sort direction (either asc for ascending or desc for descending). Sortable properties are: dateCreated amount id description paymentDate .
        Returns:
        a ResourceList object which holds the list of Authorization objects and the total number of Authorization objects available.
        Throws:
        ApiCommunicationException
        AuthenticationException
        InvalidRequestException
        NotAllowedException
        SystemException
        See Also:
        ResourceList

      • list
